channel.title: No hp? how do I set it so monster have the hp I want then to have?
channel.description:
I'm makeing monsters like ::npc 9 and they have 0 hp! how do i set there hp!
*btw how do i set my server on the internet?* :confused: help!!

item.title: No hp? how do I set it so monster have the hp I want then to have?
item.dc:creator: @Crappyservermaker Crappyservermaker
item.description:
@Crappyservermaker wrote:

Its eassy!!
::npc is not creating a monsters, its making it appear
You need to change the monsters hp in the npc.cfg files, then put it on the server in the autospawn.cfg

Read full topic

i saved the notepad then i closed it re opened moparscape and then made a guard ad atked it and there was no hp…i tryed closeing mopar scape document in the whole and then re opened it then tryed makeing a guard again and…0/0 hp![br][size=1]Posted at: October 08, 2006, 07:56:22 PM[/size][hr]help!!!
